content.detailedDescription: I was working the 12am to 8am shift at a group home on the west side of the lake..A big lake.It was about 3am. i went out on the porch to have a cig.I sat down on the bench.Then i layed down and kind of was falling asleep.When i started to hear a humming sound.I looked up and s aw this huge object.It was bigger then 3 air charft carriers. it was bigger then the town it self. a town of about 5,000 people. i ran into the house to get the phone. when i came out it was gone. to this day i have never told any one but you guys.Thanks for believeing. i have seen them about 6 times in my life. i know we are not alone.Thank you guys...The world needs to know the truth...This thing was as big as a city..Freky....
content.summary: It was bigger then 3 air craft carriers.As big as a small town

content.detailedDescription: A massive, glowing (though an organic glow, if that makes sense) sphere was hovering over the crest of the other end of the small valley. i would say it was at most a quarter of a mile away and as big as the enormous villas it was flying over. it had a steady opaque blue-green glow to it.  when i noticed and began to examine, it shot up into the cosmos with a flash...
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A massive, glowing (though an organic glow, if that makes sense) sphere was hovering over the crest of the other end of the small valley. when i noticed and began to examine it, it shot up into the cosmos with a flash.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my garden with my boyfriend on a summers day building a patio. something caught my eye the sun was reflecting off a surface. i looked up in the sky their was this silver ball in the sky. i went to my partner look at this!!! there was only one cloud in the sky a small one it moved towards it then started 2 go invisible like it was putting on an invisible clock. and i watched & watched but it never came out of that cloud it was like it needed the cloud to go invisible.I wasn't afraid i'm just glad i had that experience. never thought i'd see anything like that in my life time
content.summary: U.F.O

content.detailedDescription: 2 family members and i were watching television when almost at the same time noticed something odd in the night sky outside the window and began looking out the window and saw a really bright light moving very quickly around the night sky for at least 2 hours, there is only one light that can been seen from the place we were sitting (close to zero light polution on a mostly clear night) and it was the closest house about 5 miles away on a different mountain, the craft seemed to be looking at something with a spotlight like projector pointing in all directions the spotlight had narrowed at times into a bright beam, it was atleast a mile away and was also observed with binoculars and a telescope. it moved from one mountain top to another (that were measured to be 3 miles apart) within a matter of seconds, it also descended below a mountaintop and back up to heights far greater than the mountain tops within seconds, the craft was shining its lights at the ground and seemed to be searching or studying its surroundings. we (26 yr male, 62 yr male and 58yr female) had all watched this happening for at least 2 and a half hours in awe. i was very anxious and worried about what this could be. i have seen helicopeters of all types in the night being in the military and this thing was just too fast. it travelled across the sky at speeds that seemed unbelievable. we lost sight of the object when it darted up and into a cloud formation. after looking at the area that the object was looking it looks to be a logging area i have included pictures of google earth. the object circled the logging area and the maidestone lake.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright lights moving across sky very fast in all directions with a spotlight/beam

content.detailedDescription: I was 10 years old. in gary ind. i was in bed. looking out window thought i saw lighting bug. brother in room said to early for lighting bugs. my window was straight south. by the time my brother got to window this thing was as big as a bus. he started screaming for dad and ran out of the room. as i remember this,we all ended outside watching this thing pass by going north towards lake michigan. it was large. rec. in shape. row of white lights. went slow, no noise. it passed us and as we watched it ,it was gone.It seemed to just disappear.  went over the lake. #5 my feelings. i remember being so excited . i saw a ufo. 1968. i still get goose bumbs and for some reason start crying every time i remember this.  but then, the next day. no one said anything . i'm really trying to remember and to this day i cant remember any of us talking about this.Like it never happened. i know it did. i think now it went in the lake? i now live in vegas
content.summary: Large object

content.detailedDescription: I was going home with my friend. we were talking about school, when i looked up and saw the ufo. it was cube like. it wasn't moving. i wasn't scared so i continued my way home.
content.summary: It was floating  but it was not moving. i'm sure that it wasn't a baloon.

content.detailedDescription:
my husband worked swing shift, he came in the house all excited there was a helicopter and all kinds of lights on the under construction freeway about 5 houses away and a sound fence.  next day he bought the afternoon long beach ledger just to see if there was any news on what happened on the freeway the night before.  on the first page of the local section he found the answer there was a strange man picked up walking on the freeway, he spoke no none language, and they noticed his blood was off color.  the report went on to say that they took him to the ucla medical center, they reported that the man had some different organs than humans and some of his organs were the same but in different places.

a few days later he told his friend about it so he offered to bring the paper over  but unfortionatly i accidently used it to line the garbage can and they had picked it up all ready so we went to the library to get a copy of the report and the column had been blanked out. 

just wondered if you had ever heard of this one or any info on it?
content.summary: Saw emergency light person (alien) taken to ucla hospital 2

content.detailedDescription: Morepersonal imfo later if u want i dont like typing
content.summary: Raised up one on each side floated between dn 2 ally where was one got in igot in the got in

content.detailedDescription: I was around 10 years old and at a party with my parents, i was in a pool and did not know how to swim but was in the shallow end and my mom was watching me there were also others out at pool. suddenly i remember seeing a light coming down towards pool not directly down but about 100 ft out, and then i was suddenly alone in pool and it was like i was deaf, everyone including my mom had gone inside this room that had a sliding glass door so i could see everyone but total silence. i then focused on the object and felt scarred it just hovered there about 200 ft high but i did not try and yell or call my mom. then it just went up and suddenly disappeared and instantly the sound came back on and everyone was back outside. i never said anything about this till a couple months ago while talking to my mom and surprisingly she said some stuff that freaked me out, she said she saw this object from the room she was in but was paralyzed and actually saw me going into this object. i don't recall any of this, but the fact that, i don't know it's crazy. anyway i have had this same nightmare my whole life and it makes me physically sick/scarred, i don't know what the nightmare is i wake up instantly but can never remember the dream but am scarred to death, i assume it has to do with this incident cause it's from that time. anyway i have had 2 other experiences with i will say objects, 1 here in nevada that was confirmed on tv, it was the one that went across nevada and arizona in approx 1997 maybe. and one before that at lake mead on the arizona side. that one was very interactive and did some amazing moves. anyway was just watching this ufo show and thought i would share this
content.summary: 1st  of 3 sightings, in pool party went in complete silence it seemed to look at me then leave party resume. many years later my mom verified  this incident  that i thought  only happened to me

content.detailedDescription: Living in old farmhouse.Was listening to music about 1230-100 am.Suddenly heard a sound that i had heard before as a kid living in oklahoma the sound of a tornado touching down.I instantly ran out the front door looking for it.As soon as i got about 10 foot out the door absolute quite.And this things edge was almost on top of me coming from the direction of the river barely above the trees.There wasn't a sound not even a leaf or cricket.I just stood there in disbelief as it slowly moved directly above me and stopped hovering.It moved so slow i believe about at about the speed of a person walking.I could not move.I watched it move over the barn across the fields suddenly a flash and it started traveling away at a right angle faster than anything ive ever seen.The closest comparison was like shooting off a pop bottle rocket.I ran into the house to see if my wife had heard and seen this too.I could not believe she was sound asleep.The noise in the beginning was much louder than standing next to the rr tracks.No one could sleep through that!The strangest thing is i saw no lights yet the sky was brighter while it was there like the sky just before dawn once it was gone the nights sky went back to normal.It was like i was frozen yet felt at peace.I looked up at the clock and it was about 4am but was outside only about 5 minutes.Since that night i have high pitch ringing in my ears that changes in volume and pitch constantly to this day.Ive never told anyone of this.For years i could picture this thing but couldn't really remember say or even write this down but for some reason the memories keep coming up more and more but very foggy.I have a feeling like there is something im suppose to remember and do but just cant.Like having something on the tip of your tongue and just cant remember.And the answer is no im not nuts at least i don't think so.I need to know if anyone else has ever been drawn out by a noise like i was.For some reason i feel like i was drawn out of the house that night by a memory
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Noise hovered above my head slowly moved away then a flash and made sharp turn and rapidly went out of sight

content.detailedDescription: I was with a friend on his back porch star gazing when out of my periferal vision noticed a spherical orb of light, decently bigger than a planes lights. i asked my friend if he is seeing the same thing. we watched for almost six minuets when the light had split into what looked like seven smaller lights. they shot back and forth like a swarm of small nats, or fruit flys. they appeared to have been serveying  or observing something. three more minutes went by, then all of a sudden all came back into one orb. there was this very unnerving electric/static feeling and i could not hear anything as if my ears were muted or i was deaf. my friend experiencing the same symptoms. there was a very still moment in time as it bolted out of sight towards the north star exactly. the next few days i had very real and unnerving dreams of a fourth kind. i would wake drenched in sweat and very fast heart rate and marks to what looked like three small triangular marks on my neck and rib cage.
content.summary: One main light split into six lights that hovered around like a swarm of nats

content.detailedDescription:
Hello-
i was looking at your website hoping to find this particular incident. after p* decided to get a better camera, he sold his old camera to a guy who then went to try it out in the hollywood hills. the result was this film, a 16mm silent black and white on the then standard 50 foot reel. my dad brought the film up to burlingame where he showed it to me on his projector. my dad had forgotten most of his german language, but i wonder if he took the film to the rocket scientist. the film was also seen by d* studios who said they could not imitate it.  after the guy was called a huckster, a nutcase, and worse, to try to save his reputation the guy burned the film. there were no copies of the film, and i don't know what happened to the spliced out six frames.

although the film was genuine, the newspaper article stretched the truth about the contents of the film. the object was glowing white and clearly going too fast to be an airplane. i believe the object was a relatively low altitude meteor going horizontally across the afternoon sky. the film clearly showed the mountains in the background.  the film ended before the object was out of sight.  the object could have crashed far away, or could have been tangential to earth and exited back into space.

if you have additional information on this incident, i would be interested in seeing it.

error: form keeps demanding county in event section, even though i checked los angeles
content.summary: Hollywood hills film

content.detailedDescription: Outside of friends house in the suburbs of dallas tx warm summer night clear sky no clouds no wind i was in the suburb of oak cliff dallas tx 3rd house down from 1723 michigan street on the north side of the block standing in the street facing north, when i had a strange feeling of my arms like static electricity looked south west and observed a large disk shaped object grey in color and looked like it was all one piece not riveted together with a smooth flowing surface , it was very large as stretched from my friends house over to the large oak tree of the neighbors house that had a small vacant lot then a large 2 story house on the big lot, with a very large oak tree, at least 3 story's tall this was way bigger than the goodyear blimp that use to fly at the cotton bowl football stadium the city it seemed to dwarf the houses as it expanded to the city street on the other block behind my friends house.As i watched i asked myself is this real i said to my friend are you seeing this, his reply in total amazement yes i see it. i and friend was excited,i asked my friend to go get his brother as no one would believe us, and i thought to myself if i had not looked that direction i would not of known it was even there! i waited outside starring and observing the craft, i was amazed that the craft had apparently had engines maybe 15 as it looked like jet engines in full after burn with yellow and blueish green flame emitting approx 15 to 20 feet down, and trying to rationalize this as i had observed aircraft from the sac basses i had visited with my sisters husband who was in the air force, many times earlier in life, this was no helicopter and how could this be with no sound, no sound what so ever, and was so silent eerie silent, but for air displacement no smell  i told my friend to go get his older brother, who was 18 at the time, his big  brother and my friend came out to the street, and i asked the older brother, do you see it, as my friends brother did not notice it at first, i asked him again in a more excited tone do you see what i and your brother are looking at! my friends brother seemed to be in shock as he held his mouth partially open in a most unusual way, as he was  acting like he did not want to acknowledge that the object was right there, but he did see it and he was startled. he stayed there a minute then returned to the house, i and the younger brother stayed there observing the grey metallic object that seemed to have no ridges or cornering as most aircraft are built, not a balloon or helicopter that we have seen, then the engines quit and it began moving off slowly in a south western direction then disappeared immediately, this moment in time is nothing but the truth, and now that i am retired from gov service i am compelled to tell these facts, i have served in the us navy and worked with aircraft and i have never seen another aircraft of any type do what this disk shaped behemoth did, and i do wish i could see another it was amazing.
content.summary: Outside front of house, i and friend and his brother was able to observe for 5 minutes before it took off

content.detailedDescription: I was about 4 or 5 years old at the time. it's hard to say what exact age i was because i've never really understood, nor explained my encounter until realizing what this could possibly be. i lived at the second listed address at the time, as a child. i remember sitting at the edge of my stairway, and noticing an entity behind me that seemed to stretch down the whole stairway. it was a brown color, and had long appendages. i couldn't make out a face because i was startled from what i can remember. it was a peripheral experience. upon noticing the appendages, it seemed to force its long fingers into my left pectoral area, then my left bicep area. it didn't hurt a lot. since that very day, i've noticed that i have absolutely no pectoral muscle and half of a bicep on my left side. i cannot absolutely describe why i literally first noticed this on that day. i've always been told that i was born that way. but personally, i must deny that. i've never mentioned this because it all seems so strange and unbelievable. the reason is because after it happened, i remember not caring at all until later on in life when i replay the images in my head. i literally walked out onto the front porch with my family to enjoy some watermelon that my granparents had bought. i noticed absolutely no trace of a ufo or anything like it, unless i just can't remember it. i'm not sure whether i can call it an abduction, but i did lose track of time, and it's pretty haunting actually. it seemed so fast, yet, over a stretched period of time. i feel that this is a very unique case, although, i could be wrong. all i know is that i have finally found a place to explain my experience without being judged, but taken into scientific perspective. thank you very much, i hope this could shed a further light into the world of unexplained phenomena, and especially hope to hear from you to share your opinions and ideas. thank you for doing what you do.
content.summary: Seen no ufo at all

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my driveway (north of house) waiting for my wife to come back from a storage trailer.  i her direction i  couldn't miss a very bright light above the trees to the west traveling a little faster than the speed of an airliner toward me (east of it).

i ran inside, got my new camera (leica v-luv type 114). by the time i got back to the driveway, it was overhead.

i got a couple pics at 400m zoom. this camera has a one square inch detector and is very fast. the lens can focus from 4 feet to infinity in 0.2 seconds.

so, the image can be substantially blown up and still have great resolution.
blowing it up didn't yield much other than a larger white sphere but using adobe lightroom4 and adjusting some of the huge selection of chroma  manipulations, and internal structure showed up.

this internal structure looks like a classic ufo inside the orb. i felt; it's about time." i wondered whats inside these (or this one anyway).

it raveled in a very straight line due east until it disappeared in the distance.

so be it!
content.summary: White orb has internal structure.

content.detailedDescription: Then he said he had to go they would be worried about him. he walked around the corner of the store. i got off the table i was i was setting on to see where he went because there was wild rose bushes and it was straight off cliff and he had disappeared. i was just setting there eating a ice cream when he walked up too me and started asking about einstein. there was some thing very strange about him and i think i was abducted back in 1987 while sleeping in the back of my truck on a wood cutting trip, i was woken and the forest was lite up all around my truck and that's all i remember till the next morning i am not like that if woken it's hard for me to go back asleep.
content.summary: Asked if i know eistein discribe an event & when i asked where he lived he responed in a thing called a motorhome.

content.detailedDescription:
1.I was driving heading east on jim ramsey road going home after i got off from work around 1:45 am. 

2.I notice five lights in the sky. the light in the middle was the brightest. 

3.I thought, that has to be a ufo. 

4.The object was seen just over the treetops, it was stationary for a couple seconds. then it quickly accelerated going  northeast up and diagonal. the lights left like a trail, it was similar from the tv show star trek intro. 

5.I was very excited about seeing this phenomenon. i wanted to learn more about the object. i told my father and he was surprised about what i have seen. 

6.When the object was heading northeast going up and diagonal it disappeared into thin air. the object made no sound.
content.summary: I was heading home from work and saw the object over the treetops.

content.detailedDescription: I was home trying to look something up on my phone, around 5 p.M.,when all of a sudden my phone starting flickering different screens and suddenly out of nowhere it had this high pitched screeching noise that really hurt my ears.  the t.V. and blue ray wasn't really working either for some reason. so i tried to exit everything in my phone thinking of the programs had glitched and the sound still wouldn't turn off i had to let my dog out so i walked out with her and the sound got louder.  it finally really freaked me out so i ripped out the battery it still rang a couple seconds with battery out.  but my phone wouldn't load for another five minutes after i put the battery back in it. the electronics were fine after that.
content.summary: All my electronics starting acting up and making screeching sound

content.detailedDescription: Big ball with a long orange trail. looked like it was entering atmosphere.  saw it for about 3 seconds i would say. if was moving side to side a little as it went. lots of sparks coming off. not moving as fast as any meteor or shooting star i've ever seen.
content.summary: Something burning through atmosphere

content.detailedDescription:
I was working midnights as a truck driver when a week b4 xmas 2013 leaving aurora, mn headed westbound i spotted a glimmering light over the hill tops. i thought it was some kind of xmas display and figured i would see it when leaving the next town biwabik. as i left biwabik i saw a huge triangle shaped mountain with lights wrapped all around it like an xmzs tree. i stopped my truck and got out and observed until another driver came into town and i had to leave. this was my first encounter over the next month i seen it 4 more times the last time it decended into the earth. this thing was f-ing huge at least 1000ft wide and at least as tall. i had one more encounter entering virginia mn and another thing shaped like omega with streaming bluwhite jeweled lights, wow! i observed this as i decended down hill to virginia a full minute. havent seen since but i keep looking.
also later that year (summer2014)in colorado springs co a friend and i watched 7 orbs fly over the holiest of holies ths airforce acadamy doing impossible arobatics culminating it 2 joining up and leaving the atmosphere. this happened twice in a night none of my pix ecept 1 turned out. the one looked like an orange orb but in reality they where white with an irredecent blue smile bottom, the blue was hard to look at.
i have seen other mysterious lights over biwabik, mn nothing like the first.
content.summary: Seen on several ocasions a moving mountain

content.detailedDescription:
I can remember it being a hot night like normal in ga. i was around the age of 12 or 13. my 4 family members including myself were sitting in the living room watching tv. this humm..It was faint but it slowly started to get louder. as the humm got louder the tv and everything else went out,lights,fridge etc. im not to sure why i got up to look out the back door,but i opened it up and in the field was a football shaped ufo hovering abouve the dogwood tree. it had red lights all the way around it
in the middle. my grandmother and my brother were right beside my watching this object aswell.It lasted around 4 to 5 mins with nothing going on other then it hovering there. i looked at my brother and said "are you seeing this"? as soon as i said that, i saw a white bright flash out of the corner of my eye. when i turned my head to see what happened, i only saw the red trail it left. the lights and everything in the housde went back on as if it never even happened. to make maters worse...I looked at then and said "you just saw that right"? the responce i was given was "what are you talking about, i dont know what your talking about". "why am i standing here"? "shut the door". ive had to live with this and i still am. later on in life i asked my brother if he had any idea what he saw. he cant remember if anything had happened at all. nothing. this house we lived at had more then just 1 encounter. it had many...Many encounters. this is was the first not the last.
content.summary: No one remembers it but me.

content.detailedDescription:
1. grabbing a drink
2. the bright light
3.Its just another jet but there was no noise 
4.Hover in one place then the light shined in my window 
5. it started to rain then i lost sight of it and then it stopped raining 

cell phones stopped working
content.summary: Bright lights

content.detailedDescription:
Witnessed in western sky while driving on i-96 i asked my wife if she could
see what i see and she said yes but she didn't think it was a big deal! i on the other hand went as far as to call the kent county airport and they said there was nothing on there radar? as i kept watching off and on until it just faded away.
content.summary: Was high by clouds looked chrome or mirror like.

content.detailedDescription: I was working the 12am to 8am shift at a group home on the west side of the lake..A big lake.It was about 3am. i went out on the porch to have a cig.I sat down on the bench.Then i layed down and kind of was falling asleep.When i started to hear a humming sound.I looked up and s aw this huge object.It was bigger then 3 air charft carriers. it was bigger then the town it self. a town of about 5,000 people. i ran into the house to get the phone. when i came out it was gone. to this day i have never told any one but you guys.Thanks for believeing. i have seen them about 6 times in my life. i know we are not alone.Thank you guys...The world needs to know the truth...This thing was as big as a city..Freky....
content.summary: It was bigger then 3 air craft carriers.As big as a small town

content.detailedDescription:
Last night as i was north through a rural area of route 301 in king george, virginia, i noticed a set of moving lights in the sky in front of me.  (i was traveling north on the stretch of route 301 between the tappahannock river and route 3 when i first saw the object in the sky.)  

at first glance i thought the lights might be from the wings of an unusually low-flying very large airplane, but i quickly realized that this was not an airplane.  i watched the lights more intently trying to figure it out, and thought that maybe it was two planes flying in sync with each other.  no, couldn't be that either, especially considering the positions of the lights and the fact that the lights on the front and the back remained perfectly equidistant from each other the entire time the object flew by.  

from my view this object seemed like a large rectangle.  the shorter ends had white lights, three (or maybe more) across the front and at least two on the back with one red light blinking in the middle of the rear (between the white lights).  the object seemed very large because of the diminishing perspective of the row of lights, which at first made it seem like it was tilted at an angle but then i realized it was actually a row of lights covering a long length (the way a long fence seems smaller and at an angle the farther away it is from the viewer).   the two rows of lights remained equidistant from each other the entire time the craft passed by.  (it was definitely not two planes flying in sync with each other, which my rational mind was trying to make work as an explanation.)  it floated very smoothly in a straight line from the right of my line of vision to my left.

it was dark in the area between the lights.  though i seemed to be able to see “sky” between the two rows of lights, i don’t remember actually being able to see stars.   it was like a large rectangular piece of glass floating by with lights at both ends.  it seemed to be flying parallel to the potomac river on the virginia side (crossing route 301), maybe heading toward northern virginia or washington, dc.  size?  i wouldn’t be surprised if this thing was at least 100 meters by 300 meters or so.    

my reaction?  "what the hell is that???"  awe and curiosity.  i felt a little giddy and excited.  i also felt some frustration that i didn't have anything with me that could take a photo and that i had no place safely pull over for a better view.

i kept expecting to hear a loud engine, but never heard anything at all.  i even opened my car window because i felt like i should be able to hear it.  but i heard nothing but my own car.  about 3-5 minutes passed from the time i noticed it approach from the front right of my view until i couldn’t see it anymore on my left (trees in the way).  


very interesting!
content.summary: Large rectangular object with lights in front and rear flying low near the potomac river, king george, va, across route 301

content.detailedDescription: On april 23, 2015 my oldest daughter had been in our hot tub approximately 15 minutes waiting on me to join her. we live in a very rural area on a mountain without street lights, or other interference with the night sky so it is not rare that she and i sit in our hot tub with the lights off to gain a better view of the sky. this particular night, once i joined her, she said that she had seen the craziest looking lights in the sky. she said that they didn't blink like an air craft, or fall like a shooting star, but rather flew, in a straight line, about the speed of an airplane, only without sound. she said that she had first seen one, and like a minute later a second moving in the opposite direction. i dismissed her at first thinking it was a plane or a meteor. there had been a meteor shower that peeked two nights prior to this occurance, so i said that it was probably that and we should watch the sky to see if we may catch a late glimpse of the meteor shower. we sat there talking for only about 10 minutes watching the sky, and she smacked my arm and said, " mom there's one". it took a second to find it, but once i did, i was astonished at what i was watching. it did exactly what she said. it was moving a bit faster than what an air plane appears to move, it did not blink, and it maintained a straight path and never wavered. we were watching this one and she said " see here comes the other one". sure enough in the opposite direction another exact light, moving the exact way, was traveling through the sky. i watched the first one and she watched the second one until we could no longer see them. we layed back in the hot tub looking up in silence and in like a minute another one was moving across. low and behold the second one, moving in the opposite direction, appeared. i witnessed this three times, my daughter four. so in total; i saw six lights, she saw eight. it went on for approximately 30 minutes and then when i finally got my husband to come out on our back deck to watch, they stopped.
content.summary: 9:15 p.M on april 23 while my daughter was waiting on me to join her in our hot tub, she saw strange, non blinking, star like lights, move in a straight line above in the sky. i thought she was exaggerating until i witnessed four of the same lights.

content.detailedDescription: 2 different experiences one when i was younger i woke up to a pure white light i had thought it was lighting but it was continious it lasted for more then 20 minutes i was too afraid to go look soo i went back to sleep the other experience when i was older i was out on my deck and i saw this strange light flying too slow to be a plane almost as if it was searching for something it had a white light with other lights surroinding it it had no sound another experience i was in a ship i was being lead like something was controlling me into a big room there was a window or something where i witnessed a green plannet a wierd kind of green
content.summary: Red lights on outter with white light in middle

content.detailedDescription: I was going down my road to the east, observed what i thought was a helicopter hovering, not moving at all, over my neighbors house, just above tree level to the north side of the road. it had several lights in different colors, the lights were all i could see in the dark. i slowed down wondering what it was doing, i rolled down my car window and was almost at a complete stop when the object went over my head to the south. i never did hear any sound and as it flew over me it seemed to have a triangle shape. it was dark and i could only make out the shape by the lights it had on it and it moved off fast and i didn't have chance to get out of my car before it was gone. i was shocked and realized it couldn't have been a helicopter or i could have heard it as close to me as it was. when i got to my house, which is about 1/10 of a mile away i asked my husband if he had heard a helicopter or anything and he hadn't. i called my neighbor to ask if they had seen anything and they weren't home at the time, they arrived about 10 minutes after i saw the object over their house.
content.summary: Was heading east and observed object with different colored lights hovering over neighbors house, i slowed down and let my window down, no sound, then triangle shaped object flew over me going south.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard letting my dog have her last pee for the night at about 10.30pm on the 22nd april 2015 when a very bright object in the sky caught my eye as it became visible above my 1 story house. it was a rather large triangular shaped flying object with bright red and green lights on the underneath which is the only thing i could see...I couldn't see any height of the flying craft. it flew silently across the perth sky from a south westerly to a north westerly direction where it became out of sight due to it's descend which at the rate it was steadily flying and the direction i would think it would either land or submerge into the indian ocean close to scarborough beach. i witnessed this for at least 1 1/2 minutes and was able to get someone from my house to check it out too. it was very close to earth and an incredible sight i can't stop thinking about it as i know there must have been other witnesses.
content.summary: Large low flying silent sophisticated very bright (red&green) lights aircraft never seen anything like this in my life before this event

content.detailedDescription:
I was about 8 to 10 years old living with my parents in north san diego county in a little town called rancho santa fe on a 4 acre eucalyptus grove in a custom home. while playing in the back yard, i started feeling queasy, and immediately sat down and looked up into the southern sky to see approximately 5 to 8 silver pulsating discs hovering just above the 100 foot treetops. my body felt like it was vibrating, like standing in front of a massive array of speakers at a rock concert. i was really scared but remained there long enough to see the darker port holes in the side of the crafts. the crafts started moving in the same triangular formation in an erratic direction from one way to another and then descended and stopped to hover briefly, closer to me now, about 50 feet, like they were checking me out or something. by then, i was really freaking out and started crying and it was like they saw or heard me crying and proceeded to ascend to above the tree tops and move off, slowly to the north, in an erratic fashion, emitting a pulsating humming sound. i started to run back to my house and when i glanced back at them, it almost looked like they were going to land on an outcropped bluff, to the north, but i didn't stick around to find out. i cried all the way home, still feeling kind of sick to my stomach. when i got in the house i ran to my mom and tried to tell her about what i had seen, but she just said "you better hurry up, it's almost "howdy doodie time". 
for the past 56 years i have been scanning the sky in hopes of catching their return.
next time, i want a ride!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 5 - 8 disc shaped objects flying in a triangular formation in an eratic patern.
